newsitem.title: USA: US corporate bond mart to see slew of 144a issues.
newsitem.headline: US corporate bond mart to see slew of 144a issues.

text.p: Private placement issuance is expected to dominate the U.S. corporate bond primary market on Tuesday as public issuance is seen tapering off, dealers said.
"The public new issue market has been strong, spreads are tight, but volume appears to have tapered off," a syndicate source said.

Syndicate managers say a number of private placement offerings are in pipeline for this week. They include Parker Drilling's $275 million 144a senior notes offering and Poland Communications' $100 million seven-year 144A notes offering.
